facts.fact_text: Vietnam's retail sales increased by 9.3% year-on-year in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: Vietnam’s retail sales increased by 9.3% year-on-year in January 2026

facts.fact_text: Retail sales growth eased from a 9.8% rise in the previous month.

evidences.evidence_text: easing from a 9.8% rise in the previous month.

facts.fact_text: Retail of goods, accounting 77% of overall retail sales, grew by 9.3%.

evidences.evidence_text: retail of goods, accounting 77% of overall retail sales, grew by 9.3%

facts.fact_text: Retail of goods accelerated from an 8.6% rise in the prior period.

evidences.evidence_text: accelerating from an 8.6% rise in the prior period.

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, retail trade rose by 2.6% in January.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, retail trade rose by 2.6% in January

facts.fact_text: Monthly retail trade slowed from a 3.9% gain in the preceding month.

evidences.evidence_text: slowing from a 3.9% gain in the preceding month.

facts.fact_text: For the full year 2025, retail sales were up 9.2% compared with 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: For the full year 2025, retail sales were up 9.2% compared with 2024.

evidence.evidence_text: Vietnam’s retail sales increased by 9.3% year-on-year in January 2026
For the full year 2025, retail sales were up 9.2% compared with 2024.
